message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering the value it holds.  Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but $1,000,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this deal happen.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $950,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $850,000 simply isn't enough for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900,000. This is my final offer.  If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to move on to other buyers.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid $900,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $875,000, but that's as high as I can go. Please consider this my final offer.
